mapper.insert: insert into ecb_news (pkid, Author, Title, Photo, isSchool, createtime, intro, newstype, sortnum, content) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isschool,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecb_news set Author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSchool = #{isschool,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, newstype = #{newstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, Author, Title, Photo, isSchool, createtime, intro, newstype, sortnum, content from ecb_news where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pkid, Author, Title, Photo, isSchool, createtime, intro, newstype, sortnum, content from ecb_news
